summary.Title: Warehouse workers for food packing on weekends in Hedensted
summary.JobHeadline: Warehouse workers for food packing on weekends in Hedensted
summary.Presentation: BECH Personale is currently looking for people to help with picking and packing groceries for our client in Hedensted. So if you are on sabbatical or a student, this might be something for you.

JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Warehouse workers for food packing on weekends in Hedensted
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
BECH Personale is currently looking for people to help with picking and packing groceries for our client in Hedensted. So if you are on sabbatical or a student, this might be something for you.

Position: Warehouse worker (food product packaging)

Location: Hedensted - it's good to have a car- the last busstop is 4 km from the workplace

Salary: 164 DKK per hour.

Working hours:

  • Friday: 11:00-20:00 or 17:00-01:00
  • Saturday: 10:00-19:00 or 17:00-01:00
  • There will be training Monday-Thursday
  • More hours available during peak seasons.

Working conditions:

  • The job is in a cold environment (2-4°C) – warm clothing required
  • Friendly atmosphere and supportive team.

What do you gain by working with us?

  • Attractive salary – 164 DKK per hour
  • Flexible working hours
  • Extra hours available during peak seasons
  • Work in a great team with a positive atmosphere.

Perfect for students and those looking for extra income.

Requirements:

  • Good physical condition
  • the job requires energy and efficiency
  • Ability to communicate in Danish or English
  • Own car – no access to public transport.

Looking for a well-paid job in a stable company? Don’t wait. Apply today.

If you have any questions, you are welcome to give us a call: 72 10 85 46, every weekday between 8-16.

We look forward to hearing from you.
